content.html:
Competitor Intelligence & Research

Discover how to gain a competitive edge in your industry. Learn the basics of competitor analysis, market research, and strategic insights for effective business growth.

Competitor Intelligence & Research

13 min read
19 Best Competitor Analysis Tools to Use in 2024 and BeyondTop competitor analysis tools include Semrush, Sprout Social, and Buzzsumo. Compare features and cost.
Carlos SilvaOct 03, 2024

Competitor Intelligence & Research

8 min read
Competitor Ad Spend: How to Uncover Your Rival’s BudgetEver wonder what your competitors are spending on ads? Knowing this can boost your budget strategy and keep your marketing ahead of the game.
Grace BrennanJul 24, 2024

Competitor Intelligence & Research

12 min read
6 Ways to Compare Websites (+ Competitor Analysis Tools to Use)Learn how to compare websites to gain key insights, identify gaps, and find new opportunities.
Dana NicoleJun 18, 2024

Competitor Intelligence & Research

9 min read
Google Ads Competitor Analysis: A How-to Guide (+ Top Tools)Analyzing your competitors‘ Google Ads can help improve your own campaign. Learn how to spy on their ads.
Asif AliMay 23, 2024

Competitor Intelligence & Research

12 min read

Competitive Matrix: What It Is + How to Make One (with Templates)

Use this strategic tool to compare your company‘s offerings against competitors’ in a visual format. See how.
Ravi PandyaMay 06, 2024

Competitor Intelligence & Research

9 min read

Market Analysis: What It Is & How to Do One in 2024

This article explores what a market analysis is, why it‘s important, and how to conduct one for your business.
Natalia ZhukovaMar 07, 2024

Competitor Intelligence & Research

6 min read

What Are Website Demographics? [Explained]

Website demographics describe the characteristics of the people who visit your website.
Natalia ZhukovaFeb 26, 2024

Competitor Intelligence & Research

9 min read

How to Do a Market Analysis (Step by Step)

A market analysis can help you stay competitive in your industry and find new opportunities for growth.
Tushar PolFeb 26, 2024

Competitor Intelligence & Research

9 min read

9 Competitive Insights & How to Get Them

Competitive insights are learnings about rival businesses that help you make better business decisions.
Natalia ZhukovaFeb 22, 2024

Competitor Intelligence & Research

8 min read

How to Calculate Market Share [Formula + Guide]

To calculate market share, divide your company revenue by industry revenue. Then multiply by 100.
Natalia ZhukovaFeb 08, 2024
